Class DaoTypeContainer

Namespace
WebApp.Data
Assembly
WebApp.dll

Represents a container for accessing various DAOs.

DaoTypeContainer(Dictionary<Type, object>)

Initializes a new instance of the DaoTypeContainer class with a given DAO map.

public DaoTypeContainer(Dictionary<Type, object> daoTypeMap)

Parameters

daoTypeMap Dictionary<Type, object>

The map containing DAO instances for different types.

Methods

GetDao<T>()

Gets the DAO instance for a specified type.

public IDao<T> GetDao<T>() where T : class

Returns

IDao<T>

The DAO instance for the specified type.

Type Parameters

T

The type of the DAO.

Exceptions

InvalidCastException

Thrown if the DAO instance is not of the expected type.
